title: Somalia Statistics Dashboard - Data Catalog
description: Index of available statistical datasets for the Somalia Statistics Dashboard

datasets.title: Population Growth by Region (2020-2024)
datasets.description: Annual population figures by region showing growth trends over a 5-year period

datasets.title: Literacy Rate by Region (2024)
datasets.description: Literacy rates across Somalia's regions broken down by gender and age groups

datasets.title: Vaccination Coverage by Region (2024)
datasets.description: Percentage of children who received key vaccines across Somalia's regions

datasets.title: Consumer Price Index Trends (2020-2024)
datasets.description: Consumer Price Index data showing inflation trends over the past five years

categories.name: Health
categories.description: Health indicators including vaccination and disease prevalence

categories.name: Economic
categories.description: Economic indicators such as inflation, prices, and growth
